thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 14 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-JD.Com announces financing agreements for JD Logistics

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-JD.Com announces financing agreements for JD Logistics
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - JD.Com Inc:
* JD.COM ANNOUNCES FINANCING AGREEMENTS FOR JD LOGISTICS * TOTAL AMOUNT RAISED IN THIS ROUND IS EXPECTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY $2.5 BILLION
* ‍AFTER COMPLETION OF THIS TRANSACTION, JD.COM WILL REMAIN MAJORITY SHAREHOLDER OF JD LOGISTICS WITH AN 81.4% STAKE​
* JD.COM - AGREEMENTS WITH HILLHOUSE CAPITAL, SEQUOIA CHINA, CHINA MERCHANTS GROUP, TENCENT, CHINA LIFE, CHINA DEVELOPMENT BANK CAPITAL FOF AND OTHERS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
